name: Conditional order entitlement granted (SOLE AND JOINT) SOLICITORS
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
((isSole??Applicant:))((isJoint??Applicant 1:)) ((applicant name))
((isSole??Respondent:))((isJoint??Applicant 2:)) ((respondent name))
Issue date: ((issue date))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

The court agrees that the ((isSole??applicant is))((isJoint??applicants are)) entitled to a conditional order. A judge will pronounce the conditional order at a hearing which will take place at ((court name)) on ((date of hearing)) at ((time of hearing)).

View the conditional order entitlement certificate in the documents tab: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Conditional Order entitlement granted: ((reference number))
